title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Machine Learning-Based Modeling for Predicting Fracture Toughness of Aluminum Alloys

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can develop the ability to build predictive models for aluminum alloy composition-fracture toughness relationships using four machine learning techniques, including XGBoost and ANN.
Learners can understand how to quantitatively evaluate model performance using R², RMSE, and MAPE metrics.
Learners can explain the process of designing reliable predictive models with cross-validation (k-fold).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
